data.name: Arline Junette
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Equipment you control have Job select.
Each noncreature Saga you control is a Moogle creature in addition to its other types with power and toughness are each equal to its mana value.
Exhaust — {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Search your library for an Equipment card and a Saga card and reveal them. Put them into your hand, then shuffle.

data.name: Iago, Prince of the Night
data.oracle_text:
Flying
During turns other than yours, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an instant spell or a spell with flash, you may pay {W}{B}. If you do, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that spell’s mana value.

data.name: Veha, Herald of the Downpour
data.oracle_text:
Partner with Kirit, Who Fells the Sky
Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, mill cards until you mill a land card, then put up to one card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into or leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Veha.

data.name: Kirit, Who Fells the Sky
data.oracle_text:
Partner with Veha, Herald of the Downpour
At the beginning of combat on your turn, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance, reach, and haste that’s still a land.
Sacrifice a land: Kirit gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

data.name: Anjali, Who Bleeds Silver // Those Forsaken by the Moon
data.type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Werewolf // Legendary Creature — Eldrazi Werewolf

card_faces.name: Anjali, Who Bleeds Silver
card_faces.oracle_text:
Duskbringer {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this card for {3}{U}{R} or pay {3}{U}{R} as a sorcery. When you do, it becomes night.)
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Anjali, create a 3/2 Wolf creature token, then you may put a permanent card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Daybound

card_faces.name: Those Forsaken by the Moon
card_faces.oracle_text:
Dawnbringer {3}{G} (You may pay {3}{G} as a sorcery. When you do, it becomes day.)
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Those Forsaken by the Moon, if you control a token creature, discover X, where X is the greatest power among creature tokens you control.
Nightbound

card_faces.name: Pieza, Piety Through Penance
card_faces.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Extort
Treasure tokens you control have extort.
{W}{B}, Discard a card: Exile Pieza. You may cast it this turn.

card_faces.name: Down Payment
card_faces.oracle_text: The next time one or more tokens enter this turn, for each of them, create a tapped token copy of it.

data.name: Kagai, Weaver of Lies
data.oracle_text:
Ward—Sacrifice a creature
Morbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, each player exiles an instant or sorcery card at random from their graveyard. Copy one of the exiled cards. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

data.name: Jett, Syndicate Mastermind
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {RG}. If you do, create a 1/1 red and green Mercenary creature token with menace and haste.
Jett has all activated abilities and all triggered abilities of tokens you control that don’t have the same name as this creature. The same is true for, flying, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

data.name: Jenevieve, the Timekeeper
data.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Jenevieve, the Timekeeper enters or attacks, time travel.
Whenever you discard a nonland card, you may exile it from your graveyard with five time counters on it. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend. Do this only once each turn.

data.name: The Iron Chef
data.oracle_text:
When The Iron Chef enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create your choice of a Flapjacks token, a Gumbo token, a Jerk Chicken token, or a Pecan Pie token.
{4}: Target Food becomes your Signature Dish. (When creating Food tokens, you may instead create that many copies of your Signature Dish.)

data.name: He Who Shaped the World
data.oracle_text:
When this creature enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top five cards of your library. Until your next turn, you may play one of those cards. When you do, put a time counter on this creature. Then if there are seven or more time counters on it, you win the game.
Spells you cast from exile cost {1} less to cast for each time counter on this creature.

data.name: Hanaa, Shepherd of the Meek
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield with a lifelink counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

data.name: Barash, The Orchemist
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Barash enters or attacks, Create your choice of a Junk token, a Treasure token, or a Food token. Then if you control a Junk, a Treasure, and a Food, create Buddy, a legendary 1/1 green Cat creature token with trample, haste, and devour tokens 2. If Barash is attacking, you may also have Buddy enter tapped and attacking.

data.name: Barash, The Orchemist
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Barash enters or attacks, Create your choice of a Junk token, a Treasure token, or a Food token. Then if you control a Junk, a Treasure, and a Food, create Buddy, a legendary 1/1 green Cat creature token with trample, haste, and devour tokens 2. If Barash is attacking, you may also have Buddy enter tapped and attacking.

data.name: Apollyon, Envoy of the End
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it’s an Aura card, for each creature you control that Aura could target, create a token that’s a copy of that card attached to that creature. Otherwise, put that card into your hand and you gain life equal to its mana value.
